post.body: Gonna post some crypto shit about mining and lots of tech stuff eg.(algos, asics, bios flashes, best hw for gpu rigs, miners, proxy bypassing fees of miner ) and other shit, follow me and keep up in trend guys

1st thing i want to say : All miners who want to mine Zcash. First 34 days block reward = 0, so if you do not want to waste your computing power stay on dagger hashimoto (or wherever you are). I did some research and i can tell that GPU miner for Zcash will be released between 28th of octobor - 16th of november.
